headline: Co-Founder & CEO at Aspire
summary:
Y-Combinator & Rocket Internet Alum. Entrepreneur at heart. I love finding solutions to challenging problems, getting things done and managing hyper growth products.

CEO and Co-Founder of Aspire the all-in-one finance operating system for SEA businesses

Previously EVP and part of Lazada (Alibaba Group) founding team.

experiences.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experiences.description:
Y-Combinator backed company. Building the all-in-one finance operating system for modern businesses in SEA & APAC.

ASPIRE is a technology organisation that serves businesses with convenient and modern financial tools. We started Aspire with one thing in mind - serve businesses with speed and simplicity. No long waits, paperwork, or hidden fees - so business owners and finance professionals could concentrate on growing their businesses.

experiences.title: EVP Lazada (Alibaba Group)
experiences.description: Part of core tech and product transformation taskforce leading Lazada and Alibaba platforms integration

experiences.title: Chief Marketing Officer
experiences.description:
Managing all functional teams within marketing, including Performance Marketing, Branding & Communication, Strategic Partnerships, Merchandising & Campaigns to establish Lazada as the leader in the e-commerce industry in SEA
•	Responsible for defining strategy, deploying marketing budget and setting KPI for the departments
•	Responsible for the development of Lazada brand and all its aspects
•	Design, test and implement innovative strategies to acquire and retain customers

experiences.title: Chief Executive Officer
experiences.description:
• CEO - Lamido Vietnam (Lazada)
• Responsible for a team of 100+ people, in rapid expansion
• Directly responsible for the P&L and growth targets
Responsible for onboarding, incubating, managing new and existing merchants on Lazada
• Design, test and implement processes to manage the whole merchants life-cycle
• Define key strategic goals and KPIs to measure department effectiveness

experiences.title: Regional Management / Founding Team
experiences.description:
Category Management - Home

Co-founder - HK Crossborder Hub
• Initial venture set-up & recruiting, structuring of Sourcing/Ops/Finance/BI processes and SOPs
• Head of Finance/BI/Ops department. Manage in-house brand development
experiences.location: Hong Kong / Thailand / Vietnam / Malaysia / Indonesia / Philippines

experiences.title: Global Venture Development

accomplishment_projects.title: Lenovo Going Global - The Challenge Ahead
accomplishment_projects.description: The report studies Lenovo acquisition of IBM under a strategic and operative prospective and analyses the implications for the core business. The main sections are focused on: Operational, Turnover and Cultural Impact

accomplishment_projects.title: Water & Wastewater Treatment in China - Market Opportunity and Entry Strategy for Foreign Firms
accomplishment_projects.description:
In this report we have attempted to analyze how specific Chinese government policy
actions revolving around water and wastewater (W&WW) treatment are creating a huge
market opportunity (US$6.5 billion by 2016) for wastewater treatment firms. The
government has taken a targeted approach to solve the problem of water pollution and
environmental degradation by encouraging overseas participation and has placed
greater emphasis on quality of water. Particularly, given that domestic Chinese firms
lack the experience, scale and technological knowhow to treat the wastewater to meet
China’s water quality standard and cater to the entire market, we explore how foreign
companies in the wastewater treatment industry stand to gain by pouncing onto this
market opportunity. We analyze the various structures and routes for these firms to
enter the Chinese market and we give our recommendation on which one to choose and
on how to establish a successful business model.
